availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William. T. Bryant (Knox County, Kentucky soldier)

body.p: Served in the 49th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as 2nd Lieutenant from May 4, 1863 to August 8, 1863. Served in the 49th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Captain from August 8, 1863 to .

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 448.
Find A Grave, "Cpt. William Thomas Bryant (Oct 3, 1840-May 10, 1915)," Memorial #26678727, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26678727 (accessed June 28, 2020).
